pages.content: Earth| is a planet| in our| solar| system.
It is| the third| planet| from| the sun.
Earth| orbits| the sun| every| 365| days.| This is| one year.
Earth| spins| while it| orbits| the sun.| The spin| makes day| and night.| One spin| takes| 24 hours.| This is| one day.
Earth| is tilted.| Some parts| get more| sunlight| than others.| This| makes| seasons.
Earth| has| one moon.| You can| see| the Moon| in the sky| on most| nights.
Earth| is a terrestrial| planet| with mountains,| canyons| and volcanoes.
Earth| is a special| planet.| It has| water,| land| and air.| This is| the reason| why Earth| is the only| planet| known| to have life.

People,| plants| and animals| can live| on Earth.| 
Earth| is our home!
